Modern QR Code Generator - Convert URLs to QR Codes Instantly
QR Code Generator is a handy extension that instantly converts any webpage URL into a QR code. Whether you're on a desktop or mobile device, easily share pages with quick access via QR code scanning.

How to Use:
Click on the QR Code Generator icon.
Set the color and size preferences, then click "Generate QR Code."
Your QR code will be created, and you can download it with the "Download" button.
Why Use This Extension?
This extension is perfect for quickly sharing any link using QR codes. It's especially useful when you need to access web pages on different devices, or when youâ€™re offline and want easy, scan-based access.

Developed by Esmeray Software Company, this app enhances your browsing experience with a clean interface and user-friendly features.
